basics.name: Harsh Doshi
basics.label: Computer Engineer, Agile SCRUM Master, Application Developer, DevOps
basics.summary:
Hi, I am Harsh Doshi. A web specialist, SMC certified scrum and agile practitioner. I am proficient in web projects and DevOps tasks. I worked in the industry for many years. I got exposure to many technologies. I’m endlessly curious and always looking to expand my knowledge and learn new skills. 

If you have an interesting proposal and you’d like to discuss, please feel free to reach out. I’m always open to new challenges.

work.summary:
- Implementing projects from the initial stage to the release phase, 
- Implement Scrum and Agile workflow for projects.  
- Implement services in Project, like Git, GitHub, GitLab, Composer, npm
- Soft coding and programming with multiple languages, Java, C#, PHP, Javascript, Vue, Mysql, mongo.
- Conduct UI updates, Ux tests to meet business requirements, AB testing
- Project testings, Junit, PHPUnit, C# .net framework, JEST, mocha, npm
- Implement or Update, DevOps Support for industry projects, docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipeline

work.name: New Democratic Party of Canada
work.summary:
- Led full software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis and design by collaborating closely with technical, design, and product teams
- Oversaw ongoing development and support of the NDP’s CMS (Drupal) and other web platforms 
- Led Project Management of several web-based projects and tools, including the “My Vote Plan Tool”, which connected 65,936 unique visitors to their correct voting station.
- Handle DNS servers and Manage all 338 candidate site during election period.
- Managed web servers which are cloud-based Linux server, working on and managing a Linux server.
- Actively manage, improve, and monitor cloud infrastructure on Google cloud VM Instances, SQL Instances, APP managements, Storage, API management, Network Security, Billing etc.
- Reduced costs by ~20% each month by eliminating unnecessary servers and consolidating database
- Built and deployed Docker containers to break up monolithic app into microservices, improving developer workflow, increasing scalability, and optimizing speed
- UI/UX developed for NDP and NPD main site. And All 338 candidate sites.
- Experience querying and analyzing major data sets (digital, voter contact, fundraising) using SQL.
- Provided technical training and mentorship to junior developers and analysts.
- Worked in an extremely fast paced, high efficiency, quick supply and high-profile campaign environment.
- Create and maintain fully automated CI/CD pipelines for code deployment using GitHub, Webhooks and PowerShell with log management in slack.
- I managed Google analytic, Webmasters tool, Bing website tool, Google AdWords, Google APIs, google optimize, Optimizely , AB testing tools and other console based application. 
- Setup and implement API for different services like email, MailGun, MailChimp, SMS, Forms, Type form, Cognito Forms, PDF.js, and other tools into web environment. 
- Expert SEO and SEM. 
- Contribute to digital marketing and email Marketing and SMS marketing Process.

work.name: Farm Boy Inc.
work.summary:
- Working in VS2015 .NET Framework 4.0 and higher, Asp.net, C# .Net and MVC Web Application. Extensively working with User Interface using HTML5, DOM, COM, CSS, Bootstrap, Java Script, jQuery, JSON Data.
- Microsoft SQL, DB reports - SSRS, SSIS using BI - for that Using SQL server 2008/2014 and SQL server Management studio 
- Application development in IOS, Android, Windows 8/10 and Windows Mobile
- XML, PHP, MYSQL, WordPress, EDI
- worked in a fast-paced environment.
- Full cycle development including definition, design, development, implementation, testing and support.
- Debug current application to identify issues and provide solutions.
- Worked as part of development team to advance internal systems.
- Write, review, and maintain User, Developer, and other technical documentation.
- Worked under tight deadlines and with excellent teamwork and communication skills.
- Good analytical skills.
- Troubleshoot and solve complex problems in sort time to deliver solution in big scale.
- Commitment to deliver high-quality work with code optimization, server utilization, high performance.

work.name: Algonquin College of Applied Arts and Technology
work.summary:
- Primarily develop a web application using python and Django framework.
- create design for poster and UI designer
- Successfully deployed the application on IBM bluemix

work.name: Marketing Breakthroughs
work.summary:
- Involved in web design and development process. Web hosting, Domain Management, WPEngine management.
- Google Partner team
- Building new website and Online store. 
- Handling old client’s websites, update them, manage backups.
- Worked with different CMS and framework like WordPress, woo-commerce, Shopify, Volusion and custom Web applications.
- E-commerce system interaction and modification. Shopify, Volusion and Woo commerce.
- MySQL Database Administration
- Create, Update and manage different WordPress plugins.
- Create and Design Child theme from UI given from designer or client. Using WordPress Bootstrap boiler plate theme or purchased from Online market.

work.name: Softworld Solutions
work.summary:
- Manage Clients, gather information from them and distribute task in different teams. 
- Agile based project management system. Some projects are straight forward so, they were delivered by waterfall model. 
- Manage Hosting for clients
- Cloud Server Management and Administration
- Manage Domain panel and hosting for clients
- Google analytic, Webmasters tool, Bing website tool, Google AdWords, Google APIs, and console
- MySQL Database Administration
- Working with VS2013 .NET Framework 4.0 and higher, Asp.net, C# .Net and MVC Web Application. Extensively working with User Interface using HTML5, DOM, COM, CSS, Bootstrap, Java Script, jQuery, JSON Data.
- Microsoft SQL, DB reports - SSRS, SSIS using BI - for that Using SQL server 2008/2014 and SQL server Management studio 
- Logo Designing, theme designing, UX, WordPress, ecommerce, bootstrap, PHP, MySQL, Html5, Css3, JavaScript, jQuery.
- Cloud Base Application, VPS to Cloud Server Migration, Cloud Server Administration, 
- Web Hosting Management (Parallels Plesk Panel, cPanel), Cloud (Digital Ocean), hybrid mobile Application development
- Managed and install Web hosting panel
- WordPress, E-commerce portal, Web application
- Design website template for clients, Design Logos 
- UI/UX Designer 
- Hybrid Android application development.
- AdWords management on Google, Ads on Facebook 
- SEO and SEM Expert
- Manage and add API for services like SMS, email, Forms, calls.

work.name: Health Records India
work.summary:
- Develop and maintain cloud based Health records management System on Cloud Storage, Cloud server and cloud VMs.
- Achieve Migration from VPS to Cloud Server
- Handle Cloud Server Management and Administration, Network Security and Console Applications.
- Mysql Database Administration
- Managed, installed and administrate web hosting panel on cloud server
- Integrate Artificial Intelligence API  for Character Recognition for patient reports
- REST server management
- Add sms, email API 
- Create and managed Search API from images using Optical Character Recognition via Image Reader (OCR) for entier user base.

work.name: Self Employed
work.summary:
- Developed dynamic web site using UX, WordPress, ecommerce, bootstrap, PHP, MySQL, Html, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery.
- Developed Ecommerce cart website using C#, ASP.net, SQL, MS access, html, CSS, JavaScript., jQuery
- Supported Windows operating systems Vista, 7 and 8 and Microsoft Office Applications.
- Identified PC hardware and software issues and applied troubleshooting skills to resolve
- Maintained and supported Dell PC'S, HP Printers, Fujitsu and Canon scanners.
- Performed software and hardware updates as needed.
- Monitored and maintained daily backups.
- Assessed solved user problems as they arose.
- Certified PC Desktop technician.
- Learn new Development and 1st site creation.

volunteer.summary: TEAM S.A.F.E. – Safety Awareness For Everyone. An innovative initiative by Baroda (Gujarat) Police Department to educate youth of Vadodara for better traffic discipline.

I am one of the co-hosts for the Garvi Gujarat Ottawa Radio Program every Friday 7 pm-8 pm at Chin Radio Ottawa 97.9 Mhz. I volunteered for this radio program, which is in the Gujarati language. It is my primary language. It Also includes other languages like Hindi and English.

education.institution: Algonquin College of Applied Arts and Technology

skills.name: Algonquin College of Applied Arts and Technology

references.name: Mazhar Annab
references.reference:
I worked closely with Harsh as part of the web team during his time with NDP. Harsh is one of the most capable and creative web developers I had the pleasure to work with. He built all the NDP candidate sites during the federal election - which demonstrated his ability to work well under tight deadlines. 

We worked together on all of the federal NDP's digital assets including websites, emails, donation pages and custom sign up forms - Harsh was always ready to go above and beyond to build what we needed. He's also an excellent team player that can work independently and do a fantastic job.

His coding and communication skills were invaluable to our web team. Harsh can seemingly do anything, I would very highly recommend him as an addition to your team.

references.name: Michael Vasilev
references.reference: Harsh is a superstar. He is an incredibly talented computer engineer with a knack for not just problem solving, but for correctly identifying the underlying issues and determining *which* problems to solve. He is a great listener, a supportive teammate, and is always ready to lean in to help out and get the job done. Harsh is an absolute pleasure to work with and I could not recommend him more highly.

references.name: Chris Elliott
references.reference: I worked closely with Harsh during his time at Algonquin.  He proved himself to be a dedicated and detailed designer.  He also showed excellence in delivering various software systems under my guidance.  I would highly and enthusiastically recommend Harsh to join any high performing team.

references.name: Kyle John
references.reference: Harsh is a talented Developer with an abundance of skill. Whether it be on a WP platform or elsewhere Harsh has the knowledge needed to succeed.  I wish Harsh nothing but success in the future and I'm sure he will be a leader in his field.

references.name: Kandarp Patel
references.reference: Harsh is one of the best among all people I have ever met and is a loyal colleague, understands complex matters. Harsh is a strong and goal-oriented team player; with every problem, there was a solution. Highly recommended.

projects.name: Data Interaction using Cloud Computing
projects.summary: Based on the cloud computing paradigm, we developed a web-based interface for the users to interact with their data/files. Users can manage their data on the cloud and interact with commonly used files such as text files, PDF’s, documents, spreadsheets, pictures, audio, and video files. The project was implemented using technologies such as PHP5, MySQL5, HTML5, CSS, javaScript, jQuery and AJAX.
